item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, March 23, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Utah’s Republican voters fume over Doge cuts
2. [Opinion] My date used AI to psychologically profile me. Is that OK?
3. Is KKR’s bad bet on cycling the start of Europe’s private equity reckoning?
4. Saab urges Nordic neighbours to use spy plane touting its ‘unique capability’
5. Trump’s policies shatter Wall Street’s ‘US exceptionalism’ trade
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, March 23, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
